response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which holds significant value to you at $10,000. I understand its importance and would like to make it accessible to you. My proposal is to sell it to you for $9,500. This price not only ensures a fair return on my investment but also allows you to acquire an item that is worth so much to you. I believe this offer strikes a balance between maximizing the value I receive and ensuring you can enjoy the benefits of the product. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 9500}
